name: Monsignor Morrison
subtitle: Sleek School With Peak Education system & Students
info: Monsignor Morrison is a small, friendly Catholic school in St. Thomas that's part of the LDCSB. It's known for its supportive teachers, close community vibe, and focus on both learning and faith. A lot of families like it for its welcoming atmosphere and tight-knit feel.

subtitle: Large, diverse high school with strong academics and athletics
info: Lowkey I'm not too familiar with St Mary's but i've heard they're quite motivated & Awesome Staff

name: St. Anne's Catholic Elementary School
subtitle: Large Catholic elementary school with strong community and extracurricular programs
info: St. Anne's Catholic Elementary School, established in 2009, is a Catholic elementary school located in St. Thomas, Ontario. Serving students from Junior Kindergarten to Grade 8, it offers a comprehensive French Immersion program and is known for its strong academic performance. The school emphasizes faith-based education and provides a variety of extracurricular activities to support student development.

name: John Wise Public School
subtitle: A vibrant JK–8 elementary school in St. Thomas, Ontario
info: John Wise Public School is part of the Thames Valley District School Board and serves students from Junior Kindergarten to Grade 8. Located at 100 Parkside Drive in St. Thomas, Ontario, the school focuses on student well-being, academic excellence, and community engagement. With approximately 575 students, it offers language programs, special education support, and a range of extracurricular activities.

name: Locke's Public School
subtitle: A community-focused JK–8 school in St. Thomas, Ontario
info: Locke's Public School, part of the Thames Valley District School Board, serves students from Junior Kindergarten to Grade 8. Located at 20 South Edgeware Road in St. Thomas, Ontario, the school emphasizes academic excellence, character development, and community engagement. With a commitment to providing a well-rounded education, Locke's offers a comprehensive curriculum and various programs to support student growth and success.
